description: Manage backend addresses of the cross-region load balance backend address pool.

commands.name: az network cross-region-lb address-pool address add
commands.summary: Add one backend address into the load balance backend address pool.
commands.syntax:
az network cross-region-lb address-pool address add --frontend-ip
                                                    --lb-name
                                                    --name
                                                    --pool-name
                                                    --resource-group
                                                    [--admin-state {Down, None, Up}]
                                                    [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network cross-region-lb address-pool address add -g MyResourceGroup --lb-name MyLb --pool-name MyAddressPool -n MyAddress --frontend-ip-address /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/cli_test_lb_address_pool_addresses000001/providers/Microsoft.Network/loadBalancers/regional-lb/frontendIPConfigurations/fe-rlb2

commands.name: az network cross-region-lb address-pool address list
commands.summary: List all backend addresses of the load balance backend address pool.
commands.syntax:
az network cross-region-lb address-pool address list --lb-name
                                                     --pool-name
                                                     --resource-group
examples: az network cross-region-lb address-pool address list -g MyResourceGroup --lb-name MyLb --pool-name MyAddressPool

commands.name: az network cross-region-lb address-pool address remove
commands.summary: Remove one backend address from the load balance backend address pool.
commands.syntax:
az network cross-region-lb address-pool address remove --lb-name
                                                       --name
                                                       --pool-name
                                                       --resource-group
                                                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network cross-region-lb address-pool address remove -g MyResourceGroup --lb-name MyLb --pool-name MyAddressPool -n MyAddress

commands.name: az network cross-region-lb address-pool address show
commands.summary: Show the backend address from the load balance backend address pool.
commands.syntax:
az network cross-region-lb address-pool address show --lb-name
                                                     --name
                                                     --pool-name
                                                     --resource-group
examples: az network cross-region-lb address-pool address show -g MyResourceGroup --lb-name MyLb --pool-name MyAddressPool -n MyAddress

commands.name: az network cross-region-lb address-pool address update
commands.summary: Update the backend address into the load balance backend address pool.
commands.syntax:
az network cross-region-lb address-pool address update --lb-name
                                                       --name
                                                       --pool-name
                                                       --resource-group
                                                       [--add]
                                                       [--admin-state {Down, None, Up}]
                                                       [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                       [--frontend-ip]
                                                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                       [--remove]
                                                       [--set]
examples: az network cross-region-lb address-pool address update -g MyResourceGroup --lb-name MyLb --pool-name MyAddressPool -n MyAddress --frontend-ip-address /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/cli_test_lb_address_pool_addresses000001/providers/Microsoft.Network/loadBalancers/regional-lb/frontendIPConfigurations/fe-rlb2
